name_known.script: Hi {name}, this is {agent_name} with {brokerage}. I saw you were interested in {property_address}. Is now a good time to talk?
variations: Hello {name}, {agent_name} here from {brokerage}. Thanks for your interest in {property_address}. Do you have a moment?
Hi {name}, this is {agent_name} calling from {brokerage} about the home you inquired about on Zillow. Is this a good time?

name_unknown.script: Hi, this is {agent_name} with {brokerage} reaching out about a property you viewed on Zillow. Am I speaking with the person who inquired?
variations: Hello, {agent_name} here from {brokerage}. I received your inquiry from Zillow. Is this a good time to talk about the property?
Hi there, this is {agent_name} with {brokerage}. I'm following up on your Zillow inquiry. May I ask who I'm speaking with?

specific_property.script: Great! The {property_address} is a beautiful property. Are you interested in seeing it in person?
specific_property.followup: Would you like to see any other similar properties while we're out?
variations: That's a fantastic home you're interested in. When would be a good time for you to take a look?
I'd love to show you that property. Are you available to see it today or tomorrow?

general_search.script: What features are most important to you in your home search?
variations: What specific things are you looking for in your next home?
Could you tell me about your must-haves in a property?

already_agent.script: I understand you're working with another agent. Have you signed any paperwork with them?

followup.if_no: What if I could show you some properties that might be a better fit for what you're looking for?
followup.if_yes: I completely respect that relationship. I wish you the best with your home search!

just_looking.script: I understand you're in the early stages. Many of my clients started just looking too. What motivated you to start looking at homes?
variations: That's exactly how you should start! What features caught your eye about this property?
Early research is smart! Would you like to see what it looks like in person? Sometimes that helps clarify what you're looking for.

too_expensive.script: I understand price is important. What's your ideal price range? I can show you some great options in that range.
too_expensive.followup: Would you like me to set up a custom search that alerts you to properties in your price range?

need_to_sell_first.script: That's very common. Would you like me to give you a free market analysis of your current home?
variations: I can help with both selling your current home and finding your new one. Would you like to know what your home might be worth?
I specialize in helping clients coordinate selling and buying. What's your timeline for making this transition?

schedule_showing.script: I have availability today and tomorrow. Which would work better for you?
variations: Would morning or afternoon work better for viewing the property?
I could show you the property at 2pm or 4pm today. Which would you prefer?

get_commitment.script: Great! Let me confirm your appointment for {time} at {address}. What's the best number to text you the confirmation details?
variations: Perfect! I'll meet you at {address} at {time}. Would you like me to send you a calendar invite?
Excellent! I'll see you at {time}. Should I text you the property details and my contact information?

avoid_topics: Discussing financing details on first call
key_questions: When would you like to see the property?
Are you interested in seeing other similar homes?
What features are most important to you?
Have you seen any other properties in person?
